7. Payment & Transactions
7.1 Online Payments​
Do you want to accept online payments?
☐ Yes, for deposits only
☐ Yes, for full payment
☐ No, offline payment only
7.2 Payment Methods​
What payment options should be available?
☐ Credit/Debit cards
☐ Bank transfer
☐ Digital wallets (PayPal, Stripe, etc.)
☐ Cash (offline)
☐ Cheque (offline)
☐ UPI/Mobile payment (India-specific)
7.3 Deposit Requirements​
Do you require deposits for bookings?
What percentage deposit do you require? (Common: 20-50%)
When is the balance due?
7.4 Financial Documentation​
Do you need:
☐ Automatic invoice generation
☐ Payment receipt generation
☐ Order summary PDFs
☐ Contract/agreement generation
☐ Client payment history access
7.5 Payment Plans

Should installment options be available online?
